title: Village Notice Board
description: An old wooden notice board with a handwritten notice: 'NOTICE: A pocket watch of great sentimental value was stolen from me. I suspect a raider hiding in the forests north of here. I offer a generous reward to anyone who brings it back to me. - Marcus, The Crossroads.'

results.text: You agreed to help Marcus. You must go to the Crossroads to speak with him.
You don't have time to play detective. You move on.

title: The Silent Wheel
description: You come across the ruins of an old water mill. The structure seems solid and you could inspect the internal mechanisms or search the adjacent barn.

outcomes.successText: Among rusty gears, you find a small mechanic's toolkit of excellent quality.
outcomes.failureText: The mechanisms are an incomprehensible tangle of corroded metal. You find nothing useful.

results.text: Under a tarp, you find some sacks of dry grain still edible.

title: Unfinished Correspondence
description: You find an abandoned post office, with letters and packages scattered everywhere.

results.text: Most packages are ruined, but you find a small heavy one. Inside is a set of throwing knives.

outcomes.successText: A letter catches your attention: a resident writes of a 'family stash hidden under the old well'.
outcomes.failureText: The letters are mostly illegible, the ink smudged.

title: The Silent Emporium
description: You are in front of an old general store. The window is covered in dust and the wooden sign is almost illegible. The door is ajar.

outcomes.successText: Under the counter, in a hidden drawer, you find a survival manual and a box of cigars.
outcomes.failureText: You search everywhere, but find only faded receipts and dust.

results.text: The storage is damp and dark. You find a crowbar leaning against a wall and some scrap metal.

title: The Silent Oath
description: The door to a country doctor's clinic is ajar.

outcomes.successText: You identify some painkillers and antibiotics still effective.
outcomes.failureText: You find only empty bottles and torn boxes. Someone cleaned it out.

choices.text: Read the notes on the desk

results.text: You find the doctor's journal. The last pages describe the symptoms of a strange disease. You learn something about biological threats.

title: Abandoned Well
description: An old stone well in the center of the village. The water is stagnant, but you might find something at the bottom.

outcomes.successText: You descend cautiously. At the bottom you find a wooden box with old coins and a ring.
outcomes.failureText: The rope gives way and you fall into the water. You get hurt and completely wet.

results.text: The well looks too deep and dangerous. You move on.

title: Ruined Church
description: A small country church with a partially collapsed roof. The pews are still intact.

outcomes.successText: You find candles, liturgical wine still sealed, and an old silver crucifix.
outcomes.failureText: The sacristy is empty. There is nothing of value.

results.text: You sit on a pew and pray. You don't know if anyone is listening, but you feel more serene.

title: Abandoned Barn
description: A large barn with doors wide open. Inside are hay bales and old farming tools.

outcomes.successText: You find a scythe still sharp, ropes, and nails.
outcomes.failureText: The tools are too rusty to be useful.

results.text: The hay is soft and still smells of summer. You grant yourself a well-deserved rest.

title: Country School
description: A small school with a single classroom. Desks are overturned and books scattered everywhere.

outcomes.successText: You find a first aid manual for teachers and an old atlas.
outcomes.failureText: Most books are water damaged. Useless.

results.text: Colorful drawings of happy families cover the walls. A world lost forever.

title: Blacksmith's Forge
description: An abandoned forge with the anvil still in place. Tools are scattered everywhere.

outcomes.successText: You find hammers, tongs, and raw metal ingots. Precious materials for crafting.
outcomes.failureText: The tools are too heavy or unusable. You take nothing.

outcomes.successText: You find a partially forged sword and some spear tips.
outcomes.failureText: There is nothing complete. Only unusable pieces of metal.

title: Village Graveyard
description: A small fenced graveyard. Some graves have been desecrated.

outcomes.successText: Someone dug recently. You find scattered funeral jewelry.
outcomes.failureText: The graves are empty. The looters have already taken everything.

choices.text: Read the names on the tombstones

results.text: You clear moss from a stone slab. The engraving reads: 'Here lies {RANDOM_DONOR}, who tried to rebuild the world.'
Desecrating graves is a barbaric act. You will not stoop to this level.

title: Village Tavern
description: A small tavern with overturned chairs and broken glasses on the floor.

outcomes.successText: The cellar is full of still sealed bottles. Quality alcohol.
outcomes.failureText: The cellar is flooded. Nothing is recoverable.

outcomes.successText: You find preserved food supplies and kitchen utensils.
outcomes.failureText: Everything has gone bad. The smell is unbearable.

title: Windmill
description: An old windmill with stationary blades. The structure is still solid.

outcomes.successText: The view from the top is spectacular. You also find an old spyglass.
outcomes.failureText: The wooden stairs give way. You fall and get hurt.

results.text: On the ground floor you find sacks of flour still dry.

title: Mayor's House
description: The largest house in the village, with a plaque indicating 'Mayor'. It has been looted but there might still be something.

outcomes.successText: You find official documents, maps, and a safe with money and jewelry.
outcomes.failureText: The study has been completely emptied.

results.text: The bed is soft and inviting. You grant yourself an extended rest.

title: Pig Farm
description: An abandoned farm with empty pens. The smell is still strong.

outcomes.successText: You find sacks of feed still closed and farming equipment.
outcomes.failureText: The feed is moldy. There is nothing usable.

results.text: The smell is unbearable. You leave quickly.

title: Abandoned Chicken Coop
description: A chicken coop with open doors. There are still feathers everywhere but no chickens.

choices.text: Search for eggs in the nests

outcomes.successText: You find some eggs still fresh. Precious food.
outcomes.failureText: The eggs are all rotten. Nothing to recover.

results.text: It's not worth searching in an empty chicken coop.

title: Tool Shed
description: A small shed with gardening tools hanging on the walls.

results.text: You collect hoes, shovels, and a still sharp axe.

title: Abandoned Orchard
description: A small orchard with fruit trees still laden. Apples, pears, and plums are ripe.

outcomes.successText: You gather fresh and healthy fruit. Nutritious food.
outcomes.failureText: Most of the fruit is wormy or rotten.

results.text: The shade is cool and the air smells of fruit. A moment of peace.

title: Stone Bridge
description: An old stone bridge crossing a stream. The structure seems solid.

outcomes.successText: You catch some river fish. Fresh food.
outcomes.failureText: The stream is almost dry. No fish.

results.text: The bridge is solid. You cross it without problems.

title: Abandoned Cart
description: An old wooden cart overturned on the side of the road. The cargo is scattered everywhere.

outcomes.successText: You find fabrics, ropes, and some tools still usable.
outcomes.failureText: The cargo is ruined and unusable.

results.text: There seems to be nothing useful. You go on.

title: Wildflower Field
description: A field covered in colorful flowers. An oasis of beauty in a dead world.

outcomes.successText: You recognize some plants with healing properties. You gather them.
outcomes.failureText: You can't distinguish useful plants from common weeds.

results.text: The scent of flowers is relaxing. For a moment you forget the devastation.

title: Hunter's Cabin
description: A small cabin isolated in the woods. Animal skins hang outside.

outcomes.successText: You find traps, ammunition, and dried meat.
outcomes.failureText: The cabin is empty. The hunter took everything away.

results.text: The cabin is cozy. You rest in the warmth.

title: Scarecrow Field
description: A farm field with creepy scarecrows swaying in the wind.

outcomes.successText: One of the scarecrows hides a human body. You find items in the pockets.
outcomes.failureText: They are just scarecrows. Nothing strange.

results.text: Something about that field makes you uneasy. Better to avoid.

title: Community Garden
description: A garden with vegetables still growing. Tomatoes, carrots, and lettuce grow lush.

results.text: You gather fresh vegetables. Healthy and nutritious food.

title: Abandoned Beehives
description: Some wooden beehives are still active. Bees buzz menacingly.

choices.text: Use smoke to calm the bees

outcomes.successText: The smoke calms the bees. You gather precious honey and wax.
outcomes.failureText: The bees get angry and attack you en masse!

results.text: Bees are dangerous. Better not risk it.

title: Hanging Laundry
description: Clothes hanging on a line sway in the wind. They have been there for months.

outcomes.successText: Some clothes are still in good condition. You take them.
outcomes.failureText: The clothes are completely ruined by the weather.

results.text: You don't need clothes right now. You go on.

title: Playground
description: A small playground with rusty swings and a broken slide. Children's toys are scattered everywhere.

outcomes.successText: You find a ball, some metal toys, and lost coins.
outcomes.failureText: Everything is broken or useless.

choices.text: Sit on the swing for a moment

results.text: You sit on the swing and remember when you were a child. A lost world.

title: The Light Blue Compact Car
description:
At the end of a dead-end alley, half-hidden under a tattered tarp, you notice the silhouette of a small car. It is an old model compact car, whose paint, once a bright blue, is now peeling and dull. The driver's door is ajar.

Approaching, you see that the interior has been transformed into a sort of makeshift studio. Cables run everywhere, connecting an old microphone to a modified radio transmitter, all powered by a series of car batteries connected in series. On the dashboard, a piece of yellowed tape bears a marker inscription: 'The Katzus'.

It seems that someone, in this small corner of the world, tried to keep a voice alive in the silence.

outcomes.successText: The equipment is a masterpiece of ingenuity and improvisation. The transmitter has been modified to work at low power, but with a wide range. You find a tape recorder connected to the mixer. You press 'play'. A warm and slightly tired voice fills the cabin: '...and this was the last message from Captain Keith Arrow for The Elder Radio. If anyone is listening... don't give up. There is always a song worth listening to. Over and out.' The recording ends. You recover the cassette and some useful electronic components.
outcomes.failureText: The equipment is too complex and damaged. Touching a wrong cable, you cause a short circuit. The last light on the transmitter goes out with a hiss. Whatever secret it held, it is lost.

success.text: You recovered Captain Keith Arrow's last broadcast. An echo of hope in a silent world.

choices.text: Search the glove compartment and under the seats

results.text: In the glove compartment, you find a collection of cassettes with handwritten labels: 'Classic Rock', '80s', 'For Lonely Nights'. Under the passenger seat, a map of the region with dozens of circles and notes. It seems the 'Captain' was trying to map other settlements, perhaps to create a network of listeners. It is the map of a dreamer.

You decide not to touch anything. This is not a depot to be looted; it is the monument to someone who fought the Silence with the only weapon he had: his voice. You close the door of the light blue compact car softly, leaving 'The Katzus' to its rest. The idea that someone, somewhere, tried to keep a human connection alive gives you a strange strength.
